item.description:
The nice weather is finally here to stay. Join us for a leisure bike ride along the Minuteman Trail. We will start off in Bedford and head towards Lexington and beyond. We will stop off for refreshments along the route.

Here's a link to the bike route map if anyone is interested in looking.

http://www.minutemanbikeway.org/Media/MinutemanBikewayBrochure2.pdf

Â 

Don't have a bike? You can rent at Bikeway Source where we will be meeting. Rates are reasonable @ $24 for half day (4 hours).

After biking, we will have dinner nearby at Bamboo Asian Cuisine on 213 Burlington Road. It serves both Japanese and Chinese food. Here's the menu.

http://www.bamboogourmet.com/menu.html

If you need a ride or want to carpool, please indicate what T stop and town/city you are coming from. One of our members may be able to offer you a carpool.

www.bikewaysource.com
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in front of the store - Bikeway Source.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Biking - Minuteman Trail
